CommitComments.CommitComment: Closer to getting testPuzzle to pass.
Fixed the Piece.initalizeSquares() problem; made general to accomodate for Square.WIDTH.
Changed the way the Board and Bullpen handle pieces. No longer HashMap, now ArrayList.
Hard coded a level to test. Level created in a test case.
Changed the names of the views to more accuratly reflect the name of the view classes.
Levels now save to a special "LevelType" folder. Levels can be deleted and loaded by their level number. Kabasuji game class knows its levels and loads them upon initalization.
